data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Almería, Andalucía, Spain.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Almería, Andalucía, Spain
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 10,959 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Almería.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 53 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Almería, Andalucía, Spain.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Almería to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, help 136 new simple churches start among the 684,400 people in the county of Almería, Andalucía, Spain. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the South Asian, general people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, train the church of Almería, Andalucía, Spain to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Almería, Andalucía, Spain to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Almería, Andalucía, Spain that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
